snippet.title: Paradise - Official English Trailer
snippet.description:
Published by JAST Blue
Developed by PIL/SLASH
Release Date: 26 April 2024

Paradise is a Boys Love visual novel and tells the story of a group of men who go on holiday on a deserted island. When things begin to go wrong, they realize to their horror that they are stranded. Turns out that’s only the start of their problems.

Follow JAST USA for more information:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jastusa
Discord: https://discord.gg/rMGjzQE 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jastusa
